Contact Me
My work prioritizes consistency and stability. In order to delve into those difficult emotions and topics in an impactful way, we first need safety to feel comfortable exploring. In the same way that waves wear down rocks, the consistency of the work we do in sessions wears down and loosens the grip of what's restricting you.

I work with a variety of clients and this is more info about what I do.

Specialities:
  • Trauma and PTSD
  • Sexual Abuse
  • Grief
Issues:
  • Anxiety
  • Depression
  • Eating Disorders
  • Self-harm
  • Transgender
Communities:
  • LGBTQIA+ Allied
  • Sex Worker Allied
Ages:
  • Adult
  • Teen
  • Preteen
